H0.text: this type of nuclear decay effectively turns a proton into a neutron. Proton-Neutron Transmutation

H1.text: this type of nuclear decay effectively turns a proton into a neutron. Neutrinization

H2.text: this type of nuclear decay effectively turns a proton into a neutron. Nuclear Transmutation Reaction

H3.text: this type of nuclear decay effectively turns a proton into a neutron. beta decay

A4.text: This may be considered as the decay of a proton inside the nucleus to a neutron: p → n + e+ + νe

A5.text: In electron capture, an inner atomic electron is captured by a proton in the nucleus, transforming it into a neutron, and an electron neutrino is released.
